nodes.text: Renz was a human male who served as a commander in the Galactic Empire and was stationed at the bunker housing the Death Star's shield generator on the Forest Moon of Endor. During the Battle of Endor against the Rebel Alliance in 4 ABY, he captured the rebels who had infiltrated the bunker. When the Rebels moved to regain control of the bunker, Renz and his troops surrendered after being surrounded by Rebel soldiers and Ewoks.
Renz had light skin and brown hair. He wore a black Imperial military uniform and carried a DL-21 blaster pistol during the Battle of Endor.
Renz was portrayed by Barrie Holland in the 1983 film Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi.
